back_cards.definition_en: A long seat for multiple people.
back_cards.example_en: We sat on a bench in the park.

back_cards.definition_en: A seat for players in sports.
back_cards.example_en: He was on the bench during the game.

back_cards.definition_en: A worktable for tools or crafts.
back_cards.example_en: The carpenter built it on his bench.
The judge presided from the bench.
The bench by the lake is my favorite.
The concert was absolutely fantastic!
She did a fantastic job on the project.
This pizza tastes fantastic.
The view from the hill was fantastic.
We had a fantastic time at the park.
My financial adviser helped me save.

back_cards.definition_en: An expert in a specific field.
back_cards.example_en: She’s an adviser to the mayor.
The adviser suggested a new strategy.
My academic adviser helped pick my classes.
He’s an adviser for the tech startup.

back_cards.definition_en: To produce or give a result.
back_cards.example_en: The farm yields a lot of corn.
I yielded to the car on the right.
This investment yields good profits.
He yielded to her argument.
The orchard yields apples every fall.
